showPrompt.text: Show a prompt of how to use the background?

totalStars.help: How many stars do you want on your screen at once?

rMin.help: How large do you want the smallest star to be?

rMax.help: How big do you want the largest star to be? (Note: larger stars appear less often)

deathlabel.value: Death related settings: stars randomly dying and spawning somewhere new

dtMin.help: Seconds until a star can die

dtMax.help: Seconds until a star must die

velDecay.help: 100 = velocity is never removed (zero gravity), 0 = velocity is removed instantly.

spawnVelAmt.help: How much random velocity would you like to give stars on their spawn?

doMouseOver.text: Enable mouse interaction? (repel and attract). Uncheck if you just want random stars

collision.text: Enable collision between particles? (not recommended on low-end systems)

rRepel.help: How far away should a star be pushed away from your mouse while holding LC?

rAttract.help: How far away should a star be attracted towards your mouse?

repelStrength.help: How quickly stars are pushed away on LC

attractStrength.help: How quickly stars are brought to your mouse

elasticity.help: How much energy should bouncing stars keep? (high = bouncy)

invMouseDown.text: Invert attraction and repelling? (stars fly away normally instead of flying towards the mouse)
